content.title: Superficial Venous Thrombophlebitis (SVT)
content.definition: Superficial venous thrombophlebitis is thrombosis and inflammation of a superficial vein, characterized by a painful, erythematous, palpable cord along the course of the affected vein.

pathophysiology.extension_risk: Thrombus may propagate to deep system through SFJ or SPJ

clinical_presentation.local_signs: Erythema, warmth, tenderness along vein course
clinical_presentation.pain: Localized, worse with palpation and movement
clinical_presentation.systemic: Usually absent unless septic (then fever, chills)

diagnosis.clinical: Often clinical diagnosis based on examination
diagnosis.duplex_ultrasound: Required to rule out DVT and assess proximal extent
diagnosis.sfj_proximity: Critical - thrombus within 3-5cm of SFJ = high DVT risk

risk_stratification.high_risk: Within 3-5cm of SFJ/SPJ, >5cm length, no varicose veins, bilateral, recurrent

treatment.all_patients: Duplex to evaluate extent and exclude DVT
treatment.extensive: May require therapeutic anticoagulation as for DVT
treatment.surgical: Consider SFJ ligation if thrombus at junction despite anticoagulation
treatment.septic: IV antibiotics, remove source, possible surgical drainage

prognosis.recurrence: Common in patients with varicose veins until treated
prognosis.vte_risk: 3-4% progress to DVT/PE if untreated near junction

special_situations.malignancy_workup: Consider if unprovoked, recurrent, migratory (Trousseau syndrome)
special_situations.thrombophilia_testing: Recurrent, young age, no obvious cause
special_situations.upper_extremity: Remove catheter, may need anticoagulation if extensive

learning_objectives: Describe role of duplex ultrasound in SVT evaluation
Outline treatment algorithm based on thrombus location and extent
clinical_pearls: Always perform duplex to exclude concurrent DVT (present in 6-40%)
Thrombus within 3-5cm of SFJ requires anticoagulation
Migratory thrombophlebitis is a marker of occult malignancy
Remove IV catheters but don't forget to image for thrombus extent
pedagogical.board_yield: HIGH - common presentation, key management decisions
